title: Detroit Tigers average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2010 to 2006.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2015.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2013 to 2010.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2013.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Detroit Tigers games in Major League Baseball from 2006 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average ticket price was at 28.31 U.S. dollars . Detroit Tigers The Detroit Tigers are a franchise of Major League Baseball founded in 1894 .
